title: Pro clocks out with QR code
custom_preconds:
Enable the experiment - "qr_code_clock_in_feature"
Post a shift as Partner
Login as a Pro with activated position, book a shift and confirm it and clock in

custom_steps_separated.expected: Clock-out with QR code button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on Clock out with QR code
custom_steps_separated.expected: Verify: Displays scan QR code screen

custom_steps_separated.content: Scan the QR code using Biz App (Live shift tab -> QR code scanner)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Verify: Able to clock out the Pros
